thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Thursday, 15 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Takkt Q4 EBITDA Down At EUR 30.6 Mln

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Takkt Q4 EBITDA Down At EUR 30.6 Mln
text:
Feb 15 (Reuters) - TAKKT AG:
* DIVIDEND 0.55 EURPER SHARE * MANAGEMENT BOARD PROPOSES AN UNCHANGED DIVIDEND OF EUR 0.55 PER SHARE TO SUPERVISORY BOARD
* AT EUR 1,116.1 (1,125.0) MILLION IN 2017, GROUP GENERATED SLIGHTLY LOWER SALES THAN IN 2016
* FY UNCHANGED DIVIDEND OF EUR 0.55 PER SHARE​ * FROM 2018, TAKKT ANTICIPATES A SIGNIFICANTLY LOWER TAX RATIO THAN IN PREVIOUS YEARS IN TAKKT AMERICA SEGMENT
* ‍SEES A STRONGER YEAR IN 2018 THAN 2017​ * ‍Q4 EBITDA EUR 30.6 MILLION VERSUS EUR 33.9 MILLION YEAR AGO Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Gdynia Newsroom)
